data.scheme_name: Interest Subsidy - Agro-based, Food Processing & Allied Industry/Bio energy from Agricultural residue - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides 7% interest subsidy of term loan upto maximum of Rs. 20 lakhs.
data.eligibility: Units which have availed term loan from Financial Institutions/ Co-operative Banks/ Sarv Haryana Shetriya Gramin Bank/ Commercial Banks, after 01.01.2021, shall be eligible under the scheme.
data.conditions:
1. The unit must file Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM). 
  2. The unit should not be in the restrictive list as notified by the State Government. 
  3. The unit must obtain no objection certificate from the competent authority, if applicable. 
  4. The unit must be in commercial production. 
  5. The unit must be in regular production at the time of subsidy disbursement. 
  6. Subsidy will not be given to closed units. 
  7. Additional investment of at least 50% in plant and machinery for expansion/diversification. 
  8. Interest subsidy will be for One time during the operational period of the scheme.
data.beneficiaries: Units which have availed term loan from Financial Institutions/ Co-operative Banks/ Sarv Haryana Shetriya Gramin Bank/ Commercial Banks, after 01.01.2021, shall be eligible under the scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. The unit must file Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM). 
  2. The unit should not be in the restrictive list as notified by the State Government. 
  3. The unit must obtain no objection certificate from the competent authority, if applicable. 
  4. The unit must be in commercial production. 
  5. The unit must be in regular production at the time of subsidy disbursement. 
  6. Subsidy will not be given to closed units. 
  7. Additional investment of at least 50% in plant and machinery for expansion/diversification. 
  8. Interest subsidy will be for One time during the operational period of the scheme.
data.nodal_agency: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.context: This scheme is introduced to provide affordable credit to new Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Start-ups and enterprises operating for import substitution.
data.objective: To provide affordable credit to new Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Start-ups and enterprises operating for import substitution
data.description: Scheme provides 7% interest subsidy of term loan.
data.how_to_apply: Application in the prescribed Form for the grant of interest subsidy on the term loan, along with listed documents should be submitted to the Director/ Director General, Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises, through the web portal.
data.funding_facilitator: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefits after the approval from the concerned auhtority.
data.additional_info:
Link of list of Restrictive Industries in Haryana: https://www.hsiidc.org.in/uploads/estate_managements/170097742718HEEP%20restrictive%20list.pdf 

Categorization of Blocks : https://investharyana.in/content/pdfs/Re-categorization%20of%20blocks%2015.11.2018.pdf
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate (URC)
Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM)
NOC/CLU (No Objection Certificate/Change of Land Use)
Haryana Resident Certificate (for local employment benefits)
ESI/PF Registration Number
Proof of Commercial Production
Financial Statements (Balance Sheet, Profit & Loss Statement)
Import-Exporter Code (IEC)
Registration-cum-Membership Certificate (RCMC) from Export Promotion Council
Land Documents (ownership or lease agreement)
Environmental Clearances (if applicable)
Zero Defect Zero Effect (ZED) Certification
Proof of Investment (in machinery/equipment)
Electricity Bills (for electricity-related incentives)
Energy Audit Report (for energy efficiency claims)
Other Miscellaneous Documents (as per specific schemes)
data.checklist_info_d:
Address :  Sh. Deepak Burak , Directorate of MSME
Phone No: 8699888828
Email-id deepakbura.etd@hry.gov.in
data.beneficiary: Specific Industry - All Entities - Haryana - All MSMEs
